chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product, iPhone 12, has the above problem:

Hi,

The delivery service was supposed to be here at our home by 11:59 pm today to deliver the package. My daughter was there and didn't see anyone, and there's no notification in the mailbox either.
We had explicitly posted a note on the door asking someone to knock. 

Now it's supposed to be delivered tomorrow, unfortunately, nobody will be home not even for the whole week.

I tried to sign up with UPS to change the delivery, but unfortunately, I'm always asked for an InfoNotice number that I haven't received. This number should be noted on the notification, but I didn't receive this note.
The tracking number isn't enough here. 

Thank you very much for your support.
Best regards,
Christine Suck

Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer states that he was at home at the time UPS says they tried to deliver.

To arrange a new delivery, he needs the Info Notice number. 

Can you please give this number to us so we can help the customer?

Best regards,
Antonio from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner to request for the info notice number. We will update you once we get a response. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello,

The delivery must be done against the customer signature. This is why the driver couldn’t give it to someone else even with a note on the door.

Could you kindly ask your customer his phone number and when the carrier can deliver the parcel?

Thank you
